---
title: "feature_request_v2.yaml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines a GitHub issue template for feature requests. It provides a structured format for users to submit new feature ideas, including descriptions, motivations, visual aids, and potential implementation suggestions.

## Symbols

### Feature Request Template
#### Description
This template creates a standardized format for users to submit feature requests. It includes several fields to capture essential information about the proposed feature.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| Short description and motivation | textarea | A brief explanation of the feature and why it's needed |
| Video or screenshots | textarea | Optional visual aids to illustrate the feature |
| Possible solutions | textarea | Optional suggestions for implementing the feature |
| Additional information | textarea | Optional field for any other relevant details |

#### Internal Logic
The template uses GitHub's issue template format with the following structure:
1. Template metadata (name, description, labels)
2. Markdown introduction
3. Series of input fields (textareas) for user input
4. Validation rules for each input field

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| GitHub Issues | This template is designed to work with GitHub's issue tracking system |

### Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| name | string | "ðŸš€ Request a feature" | The title of the issue template |
| description | string | "Create a feature request for us to add to our roadmap" | Brief description of the template's purpose |
| labels | array | [enhancement] | Labels automatically applied to issues created with this template |

## API/Interface Reference
| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|:------|:-----|:---------|:------------|
| Short description and motivation | textarea | Yes | User describes the feature and its importance |
| Video or screenshots | textarea | No | User can provide visual aids |
| Possible solutions | textarea | No | User can suggest implementation ideas |
| Additional information | textarea | No | User can provide any other relevant details |

This template provides a structured way for users to submit feature requests, ensuring that the development team receives consistent and comprehensive information about proposed features. The required fields ensure that essential information is always provided, while optional fields allow for additional context when available.
